text: Photorealistic miniature city model presented as a sculpted city block on a clean white background. The city represents Shanghai, featuring simplified but recognizable iconic architecture, arranged in a compact, elevated layout. At the very top of the image, display the city name Shanghai in elegant, minimal typography. Directly beneath it, display the temperature 9°C in smaller, subtle text. Epic weather elements interact directly with the city: – Partly cloudy sky with soft sunlight filtering through appears over and around the buildings – Clouds, sunlight, rain, snow, or fog partially envelop the skyline – Weather feels larger than the city, monumental yet calm Soft global illumination, realistic materials, cinematic atmosphere. Minimal, premium, editorial-style composition. Pure white background, no clutter, no UI elements. Ultra-high realism, calm and iconic presentation.
